Name: Mortein Bombs
Details: Over the Centuries there has been nothing better invented to contol Insects of all sorts. Protect your home from insects for up to 3 months with the new Mortein Kill & Protect Control Bombs. This complete 'do-it-yourself' solution to home pest control releases a fine mist that kills more than seven of the most common pests and breaks the breeding cycle.The dual-active formula takes bug control to a new level.
